title: foxglove.Audio
description: A single frame of an audio bit stream

data.description:
Audio frame data
For packet-based audio codecs this data must begin and end on packet boundaries (no partial packets).
For PCM audio formats the samples in the data must be interleaved and little-endian.

description.description: Per-format metadata. Only needed for opus in an ogg container.

sample_rate.description: Sample rate in Hz. Only needed for PCM formats.

number_of_channels.description: Number of channels in the audio frame. Only needed for PCM formats.
